title:
Method Pour water and quinoa into saucepan over medium heat. Bring to the boil and then reduce heat to low.
Let the quinoa simmer for 15 minutes or until water is absorbed and quinoa is cooked through. Place into a bowl and and set aside to cool.
Combine the tomatoes, rocket leaves, parsley, red onion, chopped almonds and feta in a bowl. Squeeze the lemon juice, olive oil and black pepper on top and stir through.
Add the quinoa and toss all together.
Serve immediately or chill in fridge.
directions: Pour water and quinoa into saucepan over medium heat. Bring to the boil and then reduce heat to low.
Let the quinoa simmer for 15 minutes or until water is absorbed and quinoa is cooked through. Place into a bowl and and set aside to cool.
Combine the tomatoes, rocket leaves, parsley, red onion, chopped almonds and feta in a bowl. Squeeze the lemon juice, olive oil and black pepper on top and stir through.
Add the quinoa and toss all together.
Serve immediately or chill in fridge.
ingredients: 1 cup of Quinoa rinsed and drained
½ cup low fat feta cheese
1 small red onion, sliced in thin rounds
